effect.ruby_sapphire: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP. If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user’s max HP. If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.
effect.emerald: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP. If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user’s max HP. If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.
effect.firered_leafgreen: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP. If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user’s max HP. If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.
effect.colosseum: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP. If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user’s max HP. If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.
effect.xd: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP. If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user’s max HP. If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.
short_effect.emerald: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.
short_effect.colosseum: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.
short_effect.xd: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.

flavor_text.emerald: A wish that restores HP. It takes time to work.
flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A wish that restores HP. It takes time to work.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A self-healing move that restores half the full HP on the next turn.
